profile.name: Sam
profile.dietary_restrictions: none but I don't really like seafood
profile.food_preferences: middle eastern, asian, pizza, bagels, experimental food
profile.general_preferences: aerospace, museums, hiking, abandoned places, photography, games, unique activities

profile.name: Lily (fake profile)
profile.food_preferences: Prefers seafood dishes like shrimp scampi, grilled salmon, and crab cakes. Loves fresh fruits, especially berries, and vegetables like bell peppers and spinach. Enjoys salads with vinaigrette dressing.
profile.drink_preferences: Green tea, sparkling water, and pomegranate juice. Occasionally enjoys white wine with seafood dishes.
profile.general_preferences: Enjoys yoga, swimming, and stand-up paddleboarding. Often takes nature hikes and enjoys weekend getaways to coastal towns.
